item.title: Trump ends collective bargaining with unions tied to agencies with national security missions
item.description: President Trump on Thursday ended collective bargaining with several federal unions with national security missions.

item.title: Trump signs memorandum to strengthen rules around political lobbying, federal grant-making
item.description: President Trump on Thursday tightened up the rules for political lobbying related to federal grant-making.
